reviewText: I am a 40-year-old man, and yet I LOVED this tape!  It's a peaceful music video that anyone --- young or old --- can enjoy.  The music and graphics are awesome.  If you like somewhat "tame" entertainment, as I do, then I definitely recommended this tape, especially if you want something to help you relax... this program should DEFINITELY do that... I had a hard time staying awake during the program, not because it was boring, but because it was soooooo soothing and calming.
